author: Mariella Moon
title: Quibi's mobile apps will get limited support for TV casts next month
description: Quibi will soon start rolling out the ability cast its bite-sized shows to TVs.  Now, founder Jeffrey Katzenberg told Reuters that some Quibi users will be able to cast the service from their phones to their televisions starting in May.  Katzenberg also belie…
content: Quibi will soon start rolling out the ability cast its bite-sized shows to TVs. The new streaming platform launched without the feature in early April even though it would’ve been smart to do so, seeing as most people are sheltering in place due to COVID-19. … [+773 chars]
